garu kathanayakathumiyani, thangalla udamawatha anka hathalis hathe padinchi raj wana ma apa kutumbhaye gruha mulikaya lesa 2016 wasare ayawaya idiripath kirimata ida labima bhagyak kota salakami. 2011 apa kutumbhaya godanangimen anathuruwa dedena withan wimen anathuruwa wasara deka thunaka pamana kalayak gathakala asiru kala parichchedayen midi saubhagya kara piyanangime dadi uthsahaya sapala wana lakunu penennata aැthi baw sathutin prakasha karami. ☻ garu kathanayakathumiyani, 2015 warshayata sapekshawa aadayam saha wiyadam salakimen anathuruwa aadayam wadiwima lesa 2016 wasare labena rupiyal ekasiya haththawaka watup wardhakaya labimata niyamitha athara wenath aadayam nomathi baw prakasha karami.
